summary: A screenwriter travels to an abandoned house to finish a script on time, but a series of strange events lead her to a psychological breakdown.
cast: Brittany Murphy|Thora Birch|Tammy Blanchard|Marc Blucas|Claudia Troll|Michael Piscitelli
keywords: writer|burying a dead body|falling from a staircase balcony|suicide|drowning
title: Deadline
